363:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako daśottaraṃ nagaraśatamaṭitvā sumanāmukhadikpratyuddeśaṃ gatvā atiṣṭhat mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ cintayan anuvilokayan mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya darśanamabhilaṣan prārthayamānaḥ samavadhānamākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ|
363:2: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto daśottarādyojanaśatātpāṇiṃ prasārya sumanāmukhanagarasthitasyaiva sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpya evamāha-sādhu sādhu kulaputra na śakyaṃ śraddhendriyavirahitaiḥ khinnacittaiḥ līnacittairanabhyastaprayogaiḥ pratyudāvartyavīryairitvaraguṇasaṃtuṣṭairekakuśalamūlatanmayaiścaryāpraṇidhānābhinirhārākuśalaiḥ kalyāṇamitrāparigṛṣṭītairbuddhāsamanvāhṛtairiyaṃ dharmatā jñātum,
363:3: eṣa nayaḥ eṣa gocaraḥ eṣa vihāro jñātuṃ vā avagāhayituṃ vā avatarituṃ vā adhimoktuṃ vā kalpayituṃ vā pratyavagantuṃ vā pratilabdhuṃ vā iti||
363:4: sa taṃ dharmakathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣayitvā asaṃkhyeyadharmamukhasamanvāgataṃ kṛtvā anantajñānamahāvabhāsaprāptaṃ kṛtvā aparyantabodhisattvadhāraṇīpratibhānasamādhyabhijñajñānaveśāviṣṭaṃ kṛtvā samantabhadracaryāmaṇḍale'vatārayitvā svadeśe ca pratiṣṭhāpya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ||53||
